channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Meta’s new wearables trade-in program gives you Ray-Ban and Oakley discounts
item.description: For the first time, Meta is offering trade-in discounts for its smart glasses with a pilot program that’s only running through December 31st. According to a legal page on Meta’s website, trade-in discounts can be applied to the Ray-Ban Meta Gen 1, Ray-Ban Meta Gen 2, Oakley Meta HSTN, and Oakley Meta Vanguard. Notably, the […]

item.title: Dyson's 2-in-1 vacuum-mop just sunk to a new cheapest-ever price – $300 off
item.description: The V15s Detect Submarine can take care of all your floor cleaning needs, and it's cheaper than ever.

item.title: OpenAI learned the hard way that Cameo trademarked the word ‘cameo’
item.description: OpenAI might have to rename the "cameo" feature in the Sora app.

item.title: Experts tried to get AI to create malicious security threats - but what it did next was a surprise even to them
item.description: Experiments find LLMs can create harmful scripts, although real-world reliability failures prevent them from enabling fully autonomous cyberattacks today.

item.title: Scarlett Johansson Will Star in Mike Flanagan’s ‘Exorcist’ Reboot
item.description: The 'Jurassic World Rebirth' star has joined the next film in the horror franchise, this time coming from 'The Haunting of Hill House' creator Mike Flanagan.

item.title: The 4 ‘Stranger Things’ Episodes the Duffers Suggest You Rewatch
item.description: 'Stranger Things 5' is out this week on Netflix, so your window to prepare is dwindling.

item.title: A Nasty Brain Illness Is Spreading Quickly Among Horses in the U.S. Here’s What You Need to Know
item.description: At least 29 cases of equine herpes myeloencephalopathy have been detected in seven states so far.

item.title: Mentorship is the competitive edge our workplaces need to accelerate
item.description: Big Brothers Big Sisters of America’s chief impact officer on why mentorship is crucial. Lately, at every networking event or leadership roundtable, I’m hearing the same things on repeat.

item.title: Rad Power Bikes’ batteries receive major fire risk warning
item.description: The U.S Consumer Product Safety Commission claims Rad Power "refused to agree to an acceptable recall." Rad Power says the CPSC's solution would bankrupt the company.

item.title: Sam Altman and Jony Ive AI device is now in its prototype phase and its 'vibe' is defined
item.description: Laurene Powell Jobs just pulled a raft of information out of Sam Altman and Jony Ive on their upcoming AI device.

item.title: Les meilleures piles rechargeables du marché sont en promo à -26 % sur Amazon
item.description: Le problème des piles rechargeables classiques ? Elles se déchargent toutes seules dans le tiroir. Le problème des Eneloop Pro ? Elles coûtent cher. Bonne nouvelle : le deuxième problème est réglé temporairement par Amazon avec une remise de 26 %. Pour le premier, la technologie Ni-MH japonaise s'occupe de tout.

item.title: I'm changing my office setup with these 7 Amazon Haul productivity bargains for Black Friday
item.description: You can equip your office with all manner of super-affordable items from Amazon Haul.

item.title: Nvidia’s ‘I’m Not Enron’ memo has people asking a lot of questions already answered by that memo
item.description: Christ. Fine. So over the weekend, a strange Substack post from what appears to be a CEO of a pet relocation company went very viral. This post — which to be clear, is bullshit — alleges that Nvidia is engaged in what “may become the largest accounting fraud in technology history.” That’s a load-bearing “may,” […]

item.title: I've tested hundreds of laptops, and the only Surface Pro I've ever liked is now on sale for Black Friday at an unbeatable price
item.description: I love the Microsoft Surface Pro 11 more than just about any other 2-in-1 on the market, and it's even better now that it's on sale for Black Friday.

item.title: Tesla FSD software may not be approved by EU regulator after all
item.description: Tesla claimed in a weekend social media post that a Dutch regulator was set to approve its Full Self-Driving mode. It seems the regulator isn't quite in line with Tesla.

item.title: China’s Simulated Attack Shows How It Could Jam Musk’s Starlink Over Taiwan
item.description: To overcome the constellation's evasive nature, China would need a swarm of hundreds of drones, a new study finds.

item.title: Xbox Crocs are real
item.description: Microsoft is loving Crocs at the moment. After releasing Windows XP-themed Crocs earlier this year, the software maker is now putting an Xbox controller on your feet with a new limited edition pair of Crocs. Available on November 25th for $80, the Xbox Crocs mimic the Xbox One X’s controller with fixed buttons and joysticks. […]

item.title: Where Is the Trump Phone?
item.description: Is it located in the same place as the plan to repeal and replace Obamacare?

item.title: This Week’s ‘Pluribus’ Arrives Early, Carol
item.description: Apple TV is dropping episode five, 'Got Milk,' ahead of the Thanksgiving holiday.

item.title: The perfect gamer gift - Best Buy's Black Friday sale includes great deals on Razer peripherals
item.description: Looking for some decent gaming peripherals this Black Friday? Best Buy has some great discounts on Razer products today.

item.title: I compared LG’s B5 and C5 OLED TVs – here’s the Black Friday deal I’d choose
item.description: I've had extensive time using both the LG C5 and LG B5 OLED TVs, and have advice on how to know which model is right for you this Black Friday.

item.title: Earbuds deals are in full swing for Black Friday: Here are 35 of the best deals
item.description: Save on AirPods, the Powerbeats Pro 2, sleep earbuds, Bose QC earbuds, Sony earbuds, and more as Black Friday sales go into full swing.

item.title: OpenAI Is Having a Mental Health Crisis
item.description: ChatGPT's mental health team is bleeding talent and facing controversy
